courses: One introductory Environmental Sciences course from the list
Six Environmental Studies electives from at least two departments or programs
Two additional Environmental Sciences courses from the list
Four Environmental Studies courses from at least two departments or programs
One Environmental Sciences course from the list
Students must also complete an environmentally-oriented experience.

requirements: Courses listed for the Major in Environmental Studies
Original investigation in some area of environmental studies
Thesis presentation and oral presentation of the final project
To be eligible you must have a minimum cumulative GPA and a major GPA of 3.50 at the time of application and at graduation.
Students planning to pursue graduate study in environmental studies are strongly encouraged to take as many upper-level elective courses as possible.
